column4: hello guys.im planning to reformat my hd.how to copy the updates that ive downloaded?so that if i reinstall the os, ill not re-download again the updates. thanks
Keep a copy of the files in /var/cache/apt
Restore them after you reinstall and they won't be downloaded again.
